Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S7500L Unlocked Smartphone
Reviews.Author: G. Gray
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone. I bought this phone to replace my Motorola i776 flip from Sprint.I was fed up of having a contract for whenever upgrading the phone or service. Hence the reason for switching to a unlocked GSM phone.*This model Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus GT-S7500L is a mid range Android phone, which was released this past Feb, 2012. Please be advised that the instruction manual was in Spanish. This was a minor setback, I was able to download the English PDF instructions from Samsung website.*There are tons of free apps to download.*Phone, text and internet service provided by Simple Mobile. Phone and text works fine, however since Simple Mobile have not yet tested the Samsung GT-S7500L the phone is considered as unsupported. I was able to get MMSC settings from another approved Samsung Galaxy model to work on the EDGE network (2g). When not on the EDGE network it routes to my home Wi-Fi which work quite well for surfing and downloading apps.*The 5 megapixel camera takes good pictures and can be shared to Facebook. I wished this had a rear facing camera.*The keyboard can be a bit touchy, it takes some time getting acclimated. People with small fingers would do just fine.*The screen size is adequate for my needs, and the display is rich. I like the fact that the the screen can auto rotate from portrait to landscape.*Battery life is about average depending on how the device is used. This will vary from person to person. So far I have to recharge about after 24hrs of use.*My overall impression was quite good for a first time user of a Android phone.

Reviews.Title: Very Good phone for the price... (leer si eres de Venezuela)
Reviews.Author: Edgari gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I bougth this cellphone and Is very good... All the Technical details as the description mention.Good Camera, very fast to download App on market, good size of the screen, Do the job very well..Gente de Venezuela: en mi caso funciona 3G con Movilnet/Movistar el equipo es 850/1900 MHZ pregunten al vendedor antes de comprarlo porque hay una versión que solo funciona en 2100 Mhz que es Digitel. Yo lo compre a MobileCityOnline.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: mimi
Reviews.Content: i like it, in particular the android'it' s light, bright and easy to use for a new guy. but, it don't have a language of chinese so i must study English hard!

Reviews.Title: Lo recomiendo
Reviews.Author: ARVELAEZ EDGAR
Reviews.Content: Entrega realizada en tiempo estimado, muy buen equipo rapido la bateria tiene una duración bastante buena, lo he utilizado con Movilnet y Movistar acá en venezuela

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Bin
Reviews.Content: In general, this phone is good, but the battery does not last as long as advertised (11 hours or so of talk time...). Without using it (on stand by), it hardly lasts full 2 days with full charge.

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S7500L  the best medium smartphone
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: the phone arrived on time, it's in perfect conditions, excellent seller.the phoe is very good, runs great the app open quickly and the battery last for a full day with a normal use.the touchscreen is awesome. great camera with flash. the only bad side is that it hasn't front camera.the best phone for the price

Reviews.Title: Don't see any warranty paper in the box
Reviews.Author: Y. Chow
Reviews.Content: When I opened the box and read the user guide, I did not find anywhere mentioned warranty. Also searched Samsung USA website, can't find this model. Don't know how the warranty works.

Reviews.Title: Price-quality ratio is on the mark
Reviews.Author: Eugene
Reviews.Content: Well, what can I say? Is it a good phone - yes. Is it a GREAT phone - not really. But it does have its awesome perks, and is well worth the price. Through the memory expansion slot I made it's memory 32 gb, same as an Iphone has :D. W perfect phone for the perfect price. Want better one - well, pay more. No flaws noticed, no glitches, no crap. Highly recommend for people who want a good phone and are on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with the seller
Reviews.Author: Carlos Torrealba
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung GT-S7500L Gaxaly and sent me the Samsung Galaxy GT-S7500T (European)The frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA are different.The GT- S7500T not work in my country .Are responsible for the equipment they sell, I bought the GT-S7500L and I want GT-S7500L.I find it disrespectful and I want to solve the problem.

Reviews.Title: Phone: 4 Stars. Seller: 3 Stars.
Reviews.Author: S. Reece
Reviews.Content: I received the phone in less than a week and in factory new packaging. Included headphones, USB data link cable, a quick start guide, and two charging adaptors. Only problem - they fail to mention that the power adaptor with the cord is for Australia/China style outlets. The included American adaptor only fits a European style plug, so there is no way to charge from a wall outlet with the supplied chargers. Luckily I have a USB adaptor that works with my 110v American outlet so I'm covered. Just be sure you have something similar, or you'll have to use the USB cable to charge.The phone is great for people who want a smartphone but don't want to spend a week's pay to get it.

Reviews.Title: More or less a suitable buy.
Reviews.Author: Devon McBrown
Reviews.Content: I like the the phone; however, one of the main purchase point of this item was that it was upgradeable to android 4.2 from the 2.1 OS. I have tried everything but to no avail.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price
Reviews.Author: carlos jesus
Reviews.Content: I think it is an excellent price for a smart phone which is able to run most of the important applications on the market.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Denise C Campao
Reviews.Content: Excellent synchronisation with my PC and Google Play apps. Good size, good price. I'm going to by for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Excellent cellphone
Reviews.Author: porshectr
Reviews.Content: In my opinion this cellphone is really usefull. It has all a superior Samsung Galaxy has except for the frontal camera, megapixels and a slower processor. However, to me these features are not important at all. This cellphone has all the smart potential, GPS, apps, works perfectly to surf the Internet with Wifi or 3G and is fast enough to work with confortably. I love it... :-)

Reviews.Title: jhonny
Reviews.Author: Jhonny Perez
Reviews.Content: bien j h gh fger dc cvg v jyg tf rd er dew sw  dsx c hf gj hk k

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: deedee
Reviews.Content: The Samsung GT-S7500L Unlocked Cellphone works fine. It didn't come with anything much for instructions, but I was able to find a guide on-line and download it to my computer. An actual paper guide would have been helpful. The phone works well. One surprise was the European plug. Fortunately, I've lived overseas and have my own universal adapter so I can plug it into a USA wall socket using it. Also, the default language when it arrived was German, but we were able to get it switched to English without much difficulty. Good phone and just what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: elderius
Reviews.Content: Excelent phone, it's fast and good price/performance.! with 1Ghz CPU and 512 RAM, Adreno 200 GPU, my first Android. Thanks a lot

Reviews.Title: Spanish Language
Reviews.Author: Argenis Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I have a Question, Can I Switch the user interface language to spanish? because I am in Venezuela. Recently I bought a Galaxy ace GT-S5830D, and I can not switch to spanish. I want to buy the Galaxy Ace Plus GT-S7500L.
